title: Lands apart
brief_description: In this story Cathy tells the story of her parents who migrated to Australia and thanks them ” for your strength and the sacrifices you made to give us a better life” Created as part of the Racconti: La Voce del Popolo Digital Storytelling in association with The Italian Federation of Migrant Workers and their Families (FILEF).
